detail_desc: Short shorts in airy Tencel™ lyocell twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Trousers in viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Shorts in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cardigan in a soft, loose, textured knit with 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.
Wide top in soft pile with a drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Super-wide culottes in a cupro weave with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Inset panels down the legs for added width.
Sleeveless top in a plumeti-weave viscose blend with a V-neck at the front and stand-up collar with a drawstring.

Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets for safe storage of small items.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a V-neck with decorative flounces at the front.
Warm-lined boots in imitation suede with faux shearling sections, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles, and fluted soles.

Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a lace stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Two flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders, an elasticated seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.

Jacket in a sturdy pima cotton weave with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Zip-through hoodie in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Cardigan in a soft, textured knit containing some wool with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey made from a viscose blend. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.

Blouse in airy chiffon with a shimmering metallic jacquard pattern. V-shaped opening at the top with ties, and a double-layered, gathered yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that can be pulled tighter with the drawstring at the cuffs. Straight fit with a drawstring at the hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Skinny-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Patterned, waterproof wellingtons with a high shaft, loop at the back and fluted rubber soles. Fleece lining.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Calf-length, flared skirt in a lightweight weave with an elasticated waist and gathered tiers for added width. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned viscose weave with covered elastication and decorative ties at the waist, side pockets and side stripes.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains with pendants. Adjustable length, 43-51 cm.

Short dress in sturdy, cotton sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with a folded detail at the shoulders to create a defined silhouette. Long sleeves with shaping seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Gently flared blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave. Flounce-trimmed yoke, an opening with a button at the back of the neck,and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.

Shirt in organic cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a motif on the chest. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist, side pockets and fake fly.

Blouse woven in a cotton blend with an embroidered section on the front. Grandad collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long batwing sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Large earrings in metal and patterned plastic. Length 5.5 cm.

Sleeveless top in a slightly crinkled viscose weave. Narrow cut at the top with a small opening front and back and a button at the back of the neck. Spaghetti shoulder straps and a decorative pompom trim around the armholes.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket and long sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Tops in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric, one printed. Long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. High stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and wide, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Flared style with a double-layered, low-cut skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Multi-strand bracelet in imitation leather with a magnetic metal fastener.
Fitted T-shirt in wool jersey with flatlock seams at the front, a ribbed neckline and a rounded hem.
Set with a tube scarf and headband in jersey with soft fleece inside. Contrasting colour flatlock seams. Length of scarf 38 cm, circumference 56 cm.
Round-necked top in soft jersey. Short, elasticated puff sleeves in an airy weave with a frill trim, and a straight-cut hem.
Short dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck, gathered elastication at the front for a draped effect, and short sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed jersey with a wider neckline and long puff sleeves.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Shorts in an airy, patterned organic linen weave with a regular waist and concealed zip in one side. Concealed front pockets, a low crotch and wide legs. Lined at the top in organic cotton.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned jersey. Seam at the waist with pleats at the top and a decorative bow at the front, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Cut-out section at the back and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Boxy hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a motif on the front, press-studs at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with a flounce-trimmed seam at the top and short, wide, broderie anglaise sleeves.
Straight, fine-knit cardigan in a soft merino wool blend with a zip down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sandals in imitation leather with a decorative appliqué on the front, ankle strap with a hook and loop tab and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Reversible shopper with a grained imitation leather outside, imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 14x28x38 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, rib-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Cotton canvas cap with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
No-show trainer socks in mesh with a silicone trim on the inside of the heels to hold them in place.
Top in printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.

Biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Zipped chest pocket and side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front, one inner pocket and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in marled cotton jersey with a collar, no buttons and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Skater skirt in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Trousers in soft, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
T-shirt in slub jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in organic cotton jersey with short cap sleeves.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.
Jumper in a soft knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Padded velvet Alice band with sparkly stones. Width 3 cm.
